name: CreateTrelloCustomField
description:
Create a new custom field on a Trello board.

This tool creates a new custom field on a specified Trello board. Call this tool when you need to add a custom field to organize or manage information on your Trello boards.

parameters.name: custom_field_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for the new custom field, such as `idModel`, `modelType`, `name`, `type`, `options`, `pos`, and `display_cardFront`. `modelType` must be 'board'.

modelType.description: The type of model that the Custom Field is being defined on. This should always be `board`.

name.description: The name of the Custom Field

type.description: The type of Custom Field to create.

display_cardFront.description: Whether this Custom Field should be shown on the front of Cards

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

modelType.description: The type of model that the Custom Field is being defined on. This should always be `board`.

name.description: The name of the Custom Field
